Package database

Class CustomerQuery

java.lang.Object
database.CustomerQuery
public class CustomerQuery extends Object
Class that contains sql queries logical implementation for creating / updating / deleting customers from the database and the Customer class.

    • createNewCustomer

      public static boolean createNewCustomer(String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phoneNumber, Integer divisionID)
      Creates a new customer in the database with the provided information.
      Parameters:
      customerName - The name of the customer.
      address - The address of the customer.
      postalCode - The postal code of the customer.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer.
      divisionID - The division ID associated with the customer.
      Returns:
      True if the customer creation is successful, false otherwise.

    • modifyCustomer

      public static boolean modifyCustomer(Integer customerID, String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phoneNumber, String divisionId)
      Modifies an existing customer entry in the database with the provided information.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer to be modified.
      customerName - The updated name of the customer.
      address - The updated address of the customer.
      postalCode - The updated postal code of the customer.
      phoneNumber - The updated phone number of the customer.
      divisionId - The updated division ID associated with the customer.
      Returns:
      True if the customer modification is successful, false otherwise.

    • removeCustomer

      public static boolean removeCustomer(int columnId)
      Removes a customer from the database based on the given customer ID.
      Parameters:
      columnId - The ID of the customer to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the removal is successful, false otherwise.

    • getCountryNameID

      public static void getCountryNameID(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> comboBox, Map<String,Integer> countryNameIdMap)
      Retrieves country names and their corresponding IDs from the database and populates them into the provided ComboBox and map.
      Parameters:
      comboBox - The ComboBox to be populated with country names.
      countryNameIdMap - The map to store country names and their IDs.

    • getDivision

      public static void getDivision(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> comboBox, Map<String,Integer> countryNameIdMap, Integer countryID)
      Retrieves division names and their corresponding IDs from the database for a given country and populates them into the provided ComboBox and map.
      Parameters:
      comboBox - The ComboBox to be populated with division names.
      countryNameIdMap - The map containing country names and their IDs.
      countryID - The ID of the selected country.

    • customerHasAppointment

      public static boolean customerHasAppointment(Integer customerId)
      Checks if a customer has any associated appointments in the database.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to check for appointments.
      Returns:
      True if the customer has appointments, false otherwise.
